name: Ninjas
author: Sock90
notes:
I forgot to post this yesterday...
I played Ninja and GB from Plat4 to Leg1, then I wanted to try Dark Magician.
It's a decent deck, but I don't really think it has a great future...
Btw, climbed with it from Leg1 until 3rd winstreak on Leg3, but then I fell back to Leg2. Then it was an up and down switching between Dark Magician and GB, but I wanted to do one last dance with Ninjas and got KoG with it.
